page.title: 16A Week's Events in Redlynch
page.content: On Sunday more than fifty people set off on the monthly village walk through the woodlands of Hamptworth Lodge.The walk was followed by lunch in the garden. Money raised was donated to a charity for the disabled. The village hall committee arranged an outing to Bicton Gardens.They also held their annual treasure hunt and barbecue at Fritham. A ploughman's lunch was organised to raise funds for The Salisbury Hospice Appeal Fund. The School held a sale on Thursday afternoon at which cakes, toys, books, plants and other goods were sold to raise enough money to add to the amount donated by the Lover Week Committee to buy a second computer for the school.
